DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study test safety observe pharmacokinetics ( distribution elimination drug ) compound dexanabinol ( ETS2101 ) healthy male subject follow single oral dose .
DOC.brief_title: Assessment Single Doses Oral Dexanabinol Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy male age 18 45 year Body mass index 18.0 32.0 kg/m2 , outside range , consider clinically significant investigator Participation clinical research study within previous 3 month Current smoker smoke within last 12 month History drug alcohol abuse past 2 year
